author: quoctruong
body: Find-Package -Provider Nuget -Credential <MyCredential> is not working on PowerShell Core. This means user won't be able to get packages from sources that requires credential

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @quoctruong Is it needing ReadLineSafe? If so, that's coming in #1283.

comments.author: quoctruong
comments.body: Thanks @andschwa, I'll verify it once your pull request is in!

title: Find-Package with -Credential is not working for NuGetProvider
